citances.sentence: 11 On the same date as the undertakings lapsed, however, French J made asset preservation orders against Carey in separate proceedings brought by ASIC against Carey and others: see Ann Street Mezzanine Pty Ltd (In Liq) v Beck (No 1) [2008] FCA 1021. Those proceedings, VID 485 of 2008, were commenced by ASIC in the name of Ann Street Mezzanine Pty Ltd (in liquidation) pursuant to s 50 of the Australian Securities and Investments Commission Act 2001 (Cth). The practical effect of the preservation orders made by French J in VID 485 of 2008 was to extend the operation of the preservation orders (and subsequent voluntary undertakings) which had existed in relation to WAD 83 of 2006.
